sec.div: 2.4. Principal Component Analysis of the Essential Oils
sec.p: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) was performed using composition of H. brasiliense essential oils. Prior to the PCA analysis, all the variables were standardized for a normalized PCA. The Unscrambler Â® X version 9.7 (CAMO Software, Oslo, Norway) was used to perform PCA analysis and generate score and loading plot [ 22].
